text: Say ‘If your fathers and your sons and your brothers and your wives and your clan your kinsmen ‘ashīratukum a variant reading has ‘ashīrātukum and the possessions which you have acquired and merchandise for which you fear there may be no sale no longer viable and dwellings which you love are dearer to you than God and His Messenger and struggling in His way so that you have refrained from emigrating and struggling for the sake of such things then wait until God brings about His command — this is meant as a threat to them. And God does not guide the wicked folk’.
